entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
